name: Culty Penguins
description:
Ahoy,

Being forced to run for eternity, you try to survive under the culty penguins for as long as possible. Jump, run, ascend and descend by following the commands of the leader penguin.

How long will it take you to go down?

The game is currently available for android.

Feel free to leave a comment whether you liked the game!

I appreciate every comment.
